cast.overview: One man's campaign for vengeance takes on national stakes after he is revealed to be a former operative of a powerful and clandestine organization known as Beekeepers.
cast.title: The Beekeeper

details.biography: Kevin Golding is an Actor from London,England. Known for his strong presence on screen. In films such as My Day (2019), Chasing Shadows (2019) as well as critically acclaimed short films Uncle Mike (2020) and Jasper (2015) which was nominated for best Narrative short at the Los Angeles pan African film festival,2015 and Best Foreign short at the San Francisco Black film festival 2016. His extensive stage work has seen him in a wide range of roles and a regular performer with the Royal Shakespeare Company. Most notably in their award winning production of Hamlet (2016) as well as King Lear and Cymbeline. Most recently he played Leonato in the Afro Futuristic RSC production of Much ado about Nothing (2022).
details.name: Kevin Golding
